species.name: thievul
descriptions: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: unburden
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

abilities.name: stakeout
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
